summary: Client Sarah initiated a vision meeting. Only the PM asked for a project name while Architect, Developer, and QA provided no comments.

actions.task: Propose a project name for the vision meeting

risks.risk: Key stakeholders (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input during the vision meeting, risking unclear scope and delayed alignment.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with absent stakeholders, schedule a dedicated session to gather input, circulate agenda and questions in advance, and set a deadline for name and vision decisions.
